item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, December 30, 2024 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. AI companies cause most of traffic on forums (244 points | 156 comments)
2. Execution Units Are Often Pipelined (84 points | 30 comments)
3. Curl-Impersonate (275 points | 57 comments)
4. John Friel my father, internet pioneer and creator of QModem has passed away (16 points | discuss)
5. Beyond BLE: Cracking Open the Black-Box of RF Microcontrollers [video] (56 points | 4 comments)
6. Short Message Compression Using LLMs (65 points | 31 comments)
7. A simple way to explore data through a Tableau-like UI directly in your data app (46 points | 3 comments)
8. MiceWine – run Windows applications and games on Android smartphones (125 points | 33 comments)
9. From Pegasus to Predator – The evolution of commercial spyware on iOS [video] (334 points | 117 comments)
10. 'Obelisks': New Class of Life Has Been Found in Human Digestive System (117 points | 43 comments)
11. YouTuber won DMCA fight with fake Nintendo lawyer by detecting spoofed email (83 points | 40 comments)
12. Ts_zip: Text Compression Using Large Language Models (26 points | 4 comments)
13. Pincites (YC S23) is hiring a founding engineer to build legal AI agents (Remote) ( | hide)
14. Show HN: I built open source file sharing solution using AWS S3 (22 points | 13 comments)
15. Passkey technology is elegant, but it's most definitely not usable security (182 points | 206 comments)
16. Collection of insane and fun facts about SQLite (104 points | 47 comments)
17. KAG – Knowledge Graph RAG Framework (191 points | 62 comments)
18. Pigment Mixing into Digital Painting (336 points | 52 comments)
19. Limits to Growth (1972) (73 points | 50 comments)
20. Nikon reveals a lens that captures wide and telephoto images simultaneously (150 points | 82 comments)
21. Empirical Study of Test Generation with LLM's (8 points | 3 comments)
22. The Cody Computer (214 points | 28 comments)
23. Bench Accounting Acquired by Employer.com (63 points | 39 comments)
24. Show HN: Learn Japanese Kanji, no silly mnemonics (3 points | discuss)
25. 86Box: Emulator of x86-Based Machines (70 points | 25 comments)
26. PolyDye: Full color printer mod for Marlin 3D printers (105 points | 28 comments)
27. Wishing Everyone a Happy Solsthelion (47 points | 29 comments)
28. The Zombocom Problem (236 points | 69 comments)
29. FTC Orders 'Gun Detection' Tech Maker Evolv to Stop Overstating Effectiveness (89 points | 78 comments)
30. Apple and Meta go to war over interoperability vs. privacy (123 points | 120 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, December 30, 2024 at 6:20 PM UTC
